title: Money Talks - Is bitcoin winning over the establishment?
summary:
Our podcast on markets, the economy and business.
Also this week: why a new EU-China investment deal falls short and how companies can bridge the “skills gap”HAVING TRIPLED in value in the past quarter, the cryptocurrency continues its rollercoaster ride, as the financial establishment begins to jump aboard.
Also, why a new EU-China investment deal fails to balance competition, cooperation and confrontation.
And, what can companies do to bridge the gap between the workforce of today and the jobs of tomorrow?
Runtime: 23 minListen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneInPlease subscribe to The Economist for full access to print, digital and audio editions: www.economist.com/podcastoffer
paragraphs: Our podcast on markets, the economy and business. Also this week: why a new EU-China investment deal falls short and how companies can bridge the “skills gap”

HAVING TRIPLED in value in the past quarter, the cryptocurrency continues its rollercoaster ride, as the financial establishment begins to jump aboard. Also, why a new EU-China investment deal fails to balance competition, cooperation and confrontation. And, what can companies do to bridge the gap between the workforce of today and the jobs of tomorrow? Rachana Shanbhogue hosts. Runtime: 23 min
Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneIn
Please subscribe to The Economist for full access to print, digital and audio editions: www.economist.com/podcastoffer
